value.description: An array of objects to display.

dataKey.description: Name of the field that uniquely identifies the a record in the data.

rows.description: Number of rows to display per page.

first.description: Index of the first row to be displayed.

totalRecords.description: Number of total records, defaults to length of value when not defined.

paginator.description: When specified as true, enables the pagination.

paginatorPosition.description: Position of the paginator, options are 'top','bottom' or 'both'.

alwaysShowPaginator.description: Whether to show it even there is only one page.

paginatorTemplate.default: FirstPageLink PrevPageLink PageLinks NextPageLink LastPageLink RowsPerPageDropdown
paginatorTemplate.description:
Template of the paginator. It can be customized using the template property using the predefined keys.

- FirstPageLink
- PrevPageLink
- PageLinks
- NextPageLink
- LastPageLink
- RowsPerPageDropdown
- JumpToPageDropdown
- JumpToPageInput
- CurrentPageReport

pageLinkSize.description: Number of page links to display.

rowsPerPageOptions.description: Array of integer values to display inside rows per page dropdown.

lazy.description: Defines if data is loaded and interacted with in lazy manner.

loading.description: Displays a loader to indicate data load is in progress.

loadingIcon.description: The icon to show while indicating data load is in progress.

sortField.description: Property name or a getter function of a row data used for sorting by default

sortOrder.description: Order to sort the data by default.

defaultSortOrder.description: Default sort order of an unsorted column.

multiSortMeta.description: An array of SortMeta objects to sort the data.

sortMode.description: Defines whether sorting works on single column or on multiple columns.

removableSort.description: When enabled, columns can have an un-sorted state.

filters.description: Filters object with key-value pairs to define the filters.

filterLocale.description: Locale to use in filtering. The default locale is the host environment's current locale.

selection.description: Selected row in single mode or an array of values in multiple mode.

compareSelectionBy.description: Algorithm to define if a row is selected.

metaKeySelection.description:
Defines whether metaKey is requred or not for the selection. When true metaKey needs to be pressed to select or unselect an item and
when set to false selection of each item can be toggled individually. On touch enabled devices, metaKeySelection is turned off automatically.

contextMenuSelection.description: Selected row instance with the ContextMenu.

rowHover.description: When enabled, background of the rows change on hover.

csvSeparator.description: Character to use as the csv separator.

resizableColumns.description: When enabled, columns can be resized using drag and drop.

columnResizeMode.description: Defines whether the overall table width.

reorderableColumns.description: When enabled, columns can be reordered using drag and drop.

expandedRows.description: A collection of row data display as expanded.

expandedRowIcon.description: Icon of the row toggler to display the row as expanded.

collapsedRowIcon.description: Icon of the row toggler to display the row as collapsed.

groupRowsBy.description: One or more field names to use in row grouping.

expandableRowGroups.description: Whether the row groups can be expandable.

expandedRowGroups.description: An array of group field values whose groups would be rendered as expanded.

stateStorage.description: Defines where a stateful table keeps its state.

stateKey.description: Unique identifier of a stateful table to use in state storage.

editingRows.description: A collection of rows to represent the current editing data in row edit mode.

scrollable.description: When specified, enables horizontal and/or vertical scrolling.

scrollHeight.description: Height of the scroll viewport in fixed pixels or the 'flex' keyword for a dynamic size.

virtualScrollerOptions.description:
Whether to use the virtualScroller feature. The properties of VirtualScroller component can be used like an object in it.
Note: Currently only vertical orientation mode is supported.

frozenValue.description: Items of the frozen part in scrollable DataTable.

breakpoint.description: The breakpoint to define the maximum width boundary when using stack responsive layout.

showGridlines.description: Whether to show grid lines between cells.

stripedRows.description: Whether to displays rows with alternating colors.

size.description: Defines the size of the table.

tableStyle.description: Inline style of the table element.

tableClass.description: Style class of the table element.

tableProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the TableHTMLAttributes to table element inside the component.

filterInputProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the focusable filter input element inside the component.

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: update:first
events.description: Emitted when the first changes.

events.name: update:rows
events.description: Emitted when the rows changes.

events.name: update:sortField
events.description: Emitted when the sortField changes.

events.name: update:sortOrder
events.description: Emitted when the sortOrder changes.

events.name: update:multiSortMeta
events.description: Emitted when the multiSortMeta changes.

events.name: update:selection
events.description: Emitted when the selection changes.

events.name: update:contextMenuSelection
events.description: Emitted when the contextMenuSelection changes.

events.name: update:expandedRows
events.description: Emitted when the expandedRows changes.

events.name: update:expandedRowGroups
events.description: Emitted when the expandedRowGroups changes.

events.name: update:filters
events.description: Emitted when the filters changes.

events.name: update:editingRows
events.description: Emitted when the editingRows changes.

events.name: page
events.description: Callback to invoke on pagination. Sort and Filter information is also available for lazy loading implementation.

events.name: sort
events.description: Callback to invoke on sort. Page and Filter information is also available for lazy loading implementation.

events.name: filter
events.description: Event to emit after filtering, not triggered in lazy mode.

events.name: value-change
events.description: Callback to invoke after filtering, sorting, pagination and cell editing to pass the rendered value.

events.name: row-click
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row is clicked.

events.name: row-dblclick
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row is double clicked.

events.name: row-contextmenu
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row is selected with a ContextMenu.

events.name: row-select
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row is selected.

events.name: row-select-all
events.description: Fired when header checkbox is checked.

events.name: row-unselect-all
events.description: Fired when header checkbox is unchecked.

events.name: row-unselect
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row is unselected.

events.name: select-all-change
events.description: Callback to invoke when all data is selected.

events.name: column-resize-end
events.description: Callback to invoke when a column is resized.

events.name: column-reorder
events.description: Callback to invoke when a column is reordered.

events.name: row-reorder
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row is reordered.

events.name: row-expand
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row is expanded.

events.name: row-collapse
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row is collapsed.

events.name: rowgroup-expand
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row group is expanded.

events.name: rowgroup-collapse
events.description: Callback to invoke when a row group is collapsed.

events.name: cell-edit-init
events.description: Callback to invoke when cell edit is initiated.

events.name: cell-edit-complete
events.description: Callback to invoke when cell edit is completed.

events.name: cell-edit-cancel
events.description: Callback to invoke when cell edit is cancelled with escape key.

events.name: row-edit-init
events.description: Callback to invoke when row edit is initiated.

events.name: row-edit-save
events.description: Callback to invoke when row edit is saved.

events.name: row-edit-cancel
events.description: Callback to invoke when row edit is cancelled.

events.name: state-restore
events.description: Invoked when a stateful table saves the state.

events.name: state-save
events.description: Invoked when a stateful table restores the state.
